text:
Still in shock, thankfully we evacuated elderly family members in time thanks to @LondonFire. Never witnessed this kind of flooding in our area before

Hoping that @Hillingdon @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency can clear the riverways ASAP so we can return to our homes safely!

Please share https://t.co/6Sjkqt7Ceh

@RichardFerris63 @PeterboroughCC @EnvAgencyAnglia @PboroughMatters @peterboroughtel Am going down there tomorrow afternoon - will have a look and take photos. Is the Environment Agency responsible? @TobyWoody
RT @ChrisPage90: Since midnight Friday to 7am this morning (55 hours) an @EnvAgency rain gauge in #Hampshire has recorded 129.3mm of rainfa…

RT @EnvAgencySE: 1.45pm, Sunday

Several flood alerts and three flood warnings still in place across the South East...

Keep up with the la…

So who is going to step forward and take responsibility for the appalling state of the River Nene just to the East of Peterborough city centre? Sunken boats, piles of litter, collapsing banks @PeterboroughCC @EnvAgencyAnglia @PboroughMatters @peterboroughtel @PeterboroughCS

text:
Severe flooding in the west Drayton area - levels never before seen by residents.

Over 50 homes evacuated majority elderly - disaster during #COVID

Blockages in river colne and Frays river the root cause

Let's hope @Hillingdon @EnvAgencySE @EnvAgency can clear the riverways https://t.co/SWw7fk7DfJ
